title: Infant mortality rate in Yemen 2018
summary: Overall Deaths per 1,000 live births has decreased over the Year.
Deaths per 1,000 live births is slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Deaths per 1,000 live births, about 43.0 was reported at Year 2011
The lowest Deaths per 1,000 live births, of value 42.9 was reported at Year 2012,  2013,  2014,  2015, and 2016
min_summary: In general Deaths per 1,000 live births has stayed the same over the Year.
Deaths per 1,000 live births is slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2016.
